media:group.media:title: Thrive Polar Theme (Video Game Soundtrack)
media:group.media:description:
https://revolutionarygamesstudio.com/

It's been a while since I've made one of these, hasn't it? But here we are, another Thrive theme finally ready.

I had most of this lying around for a while, it just needed some extending and polishing, which I managed to do over the last few days. I'm decently happy with the final result, an ambient piece for the high ice of your Thrive world.

For my many subscribers who may be new to Thrive, see the above link for more information.
